name: Saleh Musa
bio: Saleh Musa is a Health Tutor and community wellness advocate committed to translating preventive health knowledge into practical action. A mentor to many young learners, Saleh’s teaching blends empathy, structure, and clarity — equipping future healthcare workers with confidence and real-world insight. He has contributed to several regional awareness campaigns and remains passionate about using education as a bridge between science and society.

cards.title: Professional Focus
cards.content: Health education, behavioral change communication, and youth mentorship — integrating traditional learning with community-based approaches.

cards.title: Achievements
cards.content: Facilitated local training sessions for 200+ CHEW students; recognized for simplifying complex health concepts through relatable storytelling.

cards.title: Vision
cards.content: To build a network of confident, compassionate health educators who can teach with both scientific accuracy and cultural understanding.
